title: Brand New House For Sale Pepiliyana, Kohuwala.
location: between Rathanapitya and Pepiliyana Junction , Kohuwala
details: 3 Storied Brand new House available for Sale situated between Rathanapitya and Pepiliyana Junction. The Property is built on a 8 Perches Land and contains a floor area of 4000 Sq.Ft. Availability of 6 Bedrooms full tiled with marble and granite, 5 fully tiled bathrooms, Remote garage parking for 2 cars easily. The kitchen is completed with custom built cabinetry and granite bench tops.
